detail_desc: Shorts in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pleats at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Leggings in cotton jersey with concealed elastication and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a frill detail down the legs.
Leggings in cotton jersey with concealed elastication and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a frill detail down the legs.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.8 cm.
Ankle-length kaftan in an airy, patterned, softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, vertical seam down the front and back, and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.

Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in softly draping satin with cap sleeves and a V-neck with a pleat. Narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, deep V-neck and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Knee-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a deep, gathered neckline. Gathered seam at the waist and in the skirt for added width. Unlined.

Blouse in woven fabric with buttons down the front and a grandad collar with narrow ties. Double-layered yoke with a seam and gathers at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and rounded hem.
Belt in a nylon weave with metal D-rings and metal clips at the ends. Width 3.5 cm.

Calf-length dress in a soft, organic cotton and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Double flounces down the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back, short puff sleeves and a seam at the waist. Lined skirt.
Cargo shorts in rustly nylon with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, mesh-lined side and back pockets, and leg pockets with a concealed zip.
Cargo shorts in rustly nylon with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, mesh-lined side and back pockets, and leg pockets with a concealed zip.
Cargo shorts in rustly nylon with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, mesh-lined side and back pockets, and leg pockets with a concealed zip.

Calf-length dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed button and frills down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Short, wide puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems, a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Recycled polyester lining.

Calf-length dress in a crisp cotton weave with a square neckline, smocking at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with covered elastication at the shoulders and hems, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a crisp cotton weave with a square neckline, smocking at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with covered elastication at the shoulders and hems, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Short-sleeved blouse in lace with a smocked stand-up collar, small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a frill-trimmed yoke at the front. Unlined.

Shirt in woven fabric with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. The shirt is made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

Shirt in woven fabric with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. The shirt is made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Shorts in soft denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend. Elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and side pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Shorts in soft denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend. Elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and side pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton denim with an open chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and buttons at the sides.

Cold shoulder playsuit in a crêpe weave with narrow, frill-trimmed elastication at the top and an opening with ties at the front. Narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and wide, flounce-trimmed legs. Lined.

Cold shoulder playsuit in a crêpe weave with narrow, frill-trimmed elastication at the top and an opening with ties at the front. Narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, and wide, flounce-trimmed legs. Lined.

Short coat in soft, felted fabric with a shawl collar and a large, detachable faux fur collar. Concealed press-studs down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted, V-neck shirt in stretch poplin made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fitted, V-neck shirt in stretch poplin made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fitted, V-neck shirt in stretch poplin made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Gently fitted blouse in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Gently fitted blouse in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Gently fitted blouse in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fitted, round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a print motif.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Partly lined.
Short skirt in an airy cotton weave with fluttery flounces and a high waist with wide smocking for a close fit. Unlined.
Short skirt in an airy cotton weave with fluttery flounces and a high waist with wide smocking for a close fit. Unlined.
A pair of chunky metal hoop earrings decorated with inset rhinestones. Diameter 3.3 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from approx. 1.5 cm to 2 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. One pair decorated with rhinestones and one pair with plastic beads.
Trainers in canvas with imitation leather details, elastic gores at the front and a loop at the back. Insoles in imitation leather and canvas. Patterned soles.
Short, two-strand shiny metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 36-44 cm.
Short, two-strand shiny metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 36-44 cm.

Kangol x H&M. Knee-length, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, padded hood, two-way zip down the front and welt pockets at the top. Long sleeves, one with the Kangol logo at the top, and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.

Kangol x H&M. Knee-length, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, padded hood, two-way zip down the front and welt pockets at the top. Long sleeves, one with the Kangol logo at the top, and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Calf-length skirt in a cotton weave with a belt. Concealed elastication and a small frill trim at the waist, belt loops and a braided jute belt with a round wooden buckle.

Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder, a seam at the hips and a jersey-lined skirt in glittery tulle.
Cardigan in a fine-knit wool and recycled polyester blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a fine-knit wool and recycled polyester blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a fine-knit wool and recycled polyester blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with overlocked frill trims at the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with overlocked frill trims at the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with overlocked frill trims at the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Polo-neck jumper in a cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in twill with a seam at the waist and press-studs at the sides. Adjustable shoulder straps with metal D-rings, and a two-part chest pocket, one side with a flap and press-stud. Unlined.
Oversized, double-breasted jacket in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and diagonal front pockets. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Oversized, double-breasted jacket in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and diagonal front pockets. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Calf-length skirt in airy, pattern-weave fabric with a crinkled effect. High waist with covered elastication, and a gathered seam at the top for added width. Lined at the top in a soft viscose weave.
Short, double-breasted trench coat in grained imitation leather with notch lapels, a tie belt at the waist and welt side pockets. Lined.
Double-breasted, oversized jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and flap front pockets. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled.
